name: setSerialMessage

createRelationshipWithRoom
func:
let relID = msg.room_id + "-" + msg.actuator_id
msg.url = "https://digital-twin-layer.api.neu.digitaltwins.azure.net/digitaltwins/" + msg.room_id + "/relationships/" + relID + "?api-version=2020-10-31"
msg.method = "put"
msg.payload = 
    {
        "$targetId": msg.actuator_id,
        "$relationshipName": "rel_has_actuator"
    }



return msg
